title: Code Review Checklist
use_case: Guide thorough peer reviews with focus on correctness and maintainability.
guardrails: Do not approve changes lacking tests unless waiver noted.
Flag security-sensitive blocks for additional review.
prompt: Analyze diff {{diff}}, issue context {{context}}, and standards {{standards}} to produce a review checklist covering functionality, tests, security, documentation, and follow-up questions.

title: Refactor Plan Builder
use_case: Outline safe refactor steps with validation and rollback checkpoints.
guardrails: List verification tests for each refactor stage.
Document rollback triggers before execution.
prompt: Build a refactor plan using architecture notes {{architecture}}, debt description {{debt}}, and coverage report {{coverage}}. Include phased steps, tests to run, metrics to monitor, and rollback criteria.

title: Unit Test Generator
use_case: Design unit test scenarios based on requirements and edge cases.
guardrails: Describe expected assertions and fixtures for each case.
Include negative and boundary scenarios when data allows.
prompt: Generate unit test scenarios for {{function_name}} using spec {{spec}}, examples {{examples}}, and edge cases {{edges}}. Detail each test purpose, inputs, expected outputs, and fixtures.

title: API Contract Validator
use_case: Check API changes against agreed contracts and client impact.
guardrails: Call out any breaking changes explicitly.
Recommend versioning strategy when new fields are added.
prompt: Evaluate API schema diff {{schema_diff}}, consumer list {{consumers}}, and change notes {{change_notes}}. Identify breaking changes, migration steps, and notify impacted consumers with timeline.

title: Data Migration Playbook
use_case: Outline migration steps, backout plans, and validation queries.
guardrails: List pre-migration backups and verification queries.
Define backout triggers tied to observed metrics.
prompt: Create a data migration playbook using source profile {{source}}, target schema {{target}}, and window {{window}}. Detail preparation, execution steps, data validation queries, and rollback plan.

title: Performance Profiling Brief
use_case: Summarize profiling results with optimization recommendations.
guardrails: Quantify impact of each recommendation with baseline vs target metrics.
Highlight measurement methodology and tooling.
prompt: Summarize profiling output {{profile}}, service SLOs {{slos}}, and recent changes {{changes}}. Identify top bottlenecks, recommend fixes with estimated impact, and list verification tests.

title: Error Log Diagnoser
use_case: Classify and prioritize production errors with remediation steps.
guardrails: Group errors by root cause hypothesis, not stack trace similarity alone.
Escalate security or privacy related errors immediately.
prompt: Analyze error logs {{logs}}, alert history {{alerts}}, and deployments {{deployments}}. Cluster issues, hypothesize causes, assign severity, and recommend remediation actions with owners.

title: Infrastructure Change Review
use_case: Assess infrastructure as code changes for risk and compliance.
guardrails: Highlight resource deletions and privilege escalations.
Verify change window aligns with change management policy.
prompt: Review Terraform diff {{terraform_diff}}, change ticket {{ticket}}, and policy checklist {{policy}}. Identify risky changes, policy gaps, required approvals, and post-change validation steps.

title: Security Scan Interpreter
use_case: Turn static analysis results into prioritized remediation guidance.
guardrails: Map each finding to severity and CWE when provided.
Include proof-of-concept reproduction steps only if already validated.
prompt: Interpret security scan report {{report}} with code owners {{owners}} and SLAs {{slas}}. Group findings by severity, assign owners, note deadlines, and suggest remediation steps.

title: Code Comment Refiner
use_case: Improve code comments for clarity and accuracy without changing logic.
guardrails: Do not modify executable code segments.
Explain rationale and edge cases in comments, not implementation details.
prompt: Revise code comments for snippet {{snippet}} using component purpose {{purpose}} and caveats {{caveats}}. Provide updated comments clarifying intent, risks, and usage without altering code.

title: Executive Update Draft
use_case: Summarize program progress for executive stakeholders each week.
guardrails: Keep the TLDR to three bullets maximum.
Flag blockers with owner, impact, and target resolution date.
prompt: Draft a weekly executive update for {{program_name}} using status notes {{status_notes}}, metrics {{metrics}}, and upcoming decisions {{decisions}}. Provide a TLDR with three bullets, progress highlights, a blocker table (owner, impact, ETA), and a closing call to action.

title: Customer Escalation Reply
use_case: Compose empathetic responses to high-priority customer escalations.
guardrails: Open with acknowledgement of the customer experience.
Commit only to remediation steps validated by the incident commander.
prompt: Write a customer escalation response referencing thread {{thread}}, customer profile {{customer}}, and resolution plan {{plan}}. Begin with empathy, state verified facts, outline remediation with owners and timelines, and restate support contact options.

title: Town Hall Agenda Builder
use_case: Structure internal town hall meetings with clear segments and prompts.
guardrails: Include live Q&A with anonymized question intake instructions.
Balance airtime across business updates, wins, and risks.
prompt: Create a town hall agenda using key messages {{messages}}, speaker list {{speakers}}, and audience concerns {{concerns}}. Provide timed segments, transition notes, Q&A facilitation guidance, and highlight diversity and inclusion moments.

title: Incident Communication Plan
use_case: Coordinate internal and external messaging during incidents.
guardrails: Clearly separate confirmed facts from investigations in progress.
List approval checkpoints before releasing external statements.
prompt: Generate an incident communication plan using summary {{summary}}, stakeholder map {{stakeholders}}, and mitigation steps {{mitigation}}. Provide timeline with owners, internal vs external messaging guidance, and approval workflow.

title: FAQ Refresh Writer
use_case: Update help center FAQ entries with latest policy and feature details.
guardrails: Surface policy changes with effective dates.
Link to supporting guides or videos using relative paths only.
prompt: Rewrite the FAQ entry using current text {{existing}}, policy updates {{policy_updates}}, and release notes {{release_notes}}. Keep answers concise, add change log callout, and include next review date.

title: Training Announcement Draft
use_case: Notify teams about upcoming training with clear expectations.
guardrails: Include prerequisites and time commitment.
Provide accessibility accommodations contact.
prompt: Draft a training announcement for {{training_name}} using overview {{overview}}, participant list {{participants}}, and logistics {{logistics}}. Include purpose, expectations, prep work, and contact for accommodations.

title: Retrospective Summary
use_case: Capture outcomes and actions from team retrospectives.
guardrails: Group insights by keep/start/stop.
Assign owners and due dates for each action item.
prompt: Summarize the retrospective notes {{notes}}, action backlog {{actions}}, and metrics {{metrics}} into keep/start/stop sections, highlight wins, and list actions with owners and due dates.

title: Product Launch Email Kit
use_case: Prepare internal and external launch announcements.
guardrails: Separate internal enablement details from external messaging.
Include CTA links as relative URLs or tracked shortlinks.
prompt: Create launch emails using brief {{brief}}, highlights {{highlights}}, and benefits {{benefits}}. Provide internal enablement copy with key actions and external customer email with CTA and support info.

title: Internal Newsletter Builder
use_case: Compile monthly internal newsletter with highlights and metrics.
guardrails: Highlight three wins, two learnings, and one upcoming focus.
Embed metrics in plain text tables for accessibility.
prompt: Assemble the internal newsletter from stories {{stories}}, metrics {{metrics}}, and events {{events}}. Provide intro note, themed sections, metric table, and call to action for submissions.

title: Stakeholder Follow-up Tracker
use_case: Document follow-ups after stakeholder meetings with owners and deadlines.
guardrails: List open questions separately from decisions.
Assign each follow-up an owner and target date.
prompt: Summarize stakeholder meeting notes {{notes}}, decisions {{decisions}}, and actions {{actions}} into a follow-up tracker with decisions made, new actions, open questions, and owners with deadlines.

title: Quarterly OKR Blueprint
use_case: Draft aligned objectives, key results, and initiatives for a new quarter.
guardrails: Do not list more than five objectives.
Flag any key result without an owner or metric.
prompt: You are the planning facilitator for Q{{quarter}}. Using {{mission}}, {{last_quarter_results}}, and draft objectives {{draft_objectives}}, produce an OKR plan with 3-5 objectives. For each objective include up to three measurable key results, the accountable leader, and milestone checkpoints. Close with a dependency checklist and risks to monitor.

title: Roadmap Risk Radar
use_case: Evaluate roadmap items for delivery, market, and dependency risk.
guardrails: Score risk on a low, medium, high scale.
Highlight unknowns that need human follow-up instead of guessing.
prompt: Review the roadmap items in {{roadmap_items}} with dependencies {{dependency_map}} and resource forecast {{resource_forecast}}. Score delivery, market, and technical risk as low, medium, or high. Summarize the top five risks with mitigation owners, trigger signals, and next review dates.

title: Stakeholder Brief Builder
use_case: Translate a project charter into a one page stakeholder brief.
guardrails: Use plain language at a grade eight reading level.
List open questions separate from confirmed decisions.
prompt: You are preparing a stakeholder brief for {{project_name}}. Summarize the charter {{charter}}, intended outcomes, timeline, and what stakeholders must do next. Provide an FAQ seed list of at least six likely questions using the stakeholder personas in {{stakeholders}}.

title: Resourcing Scenario Modeler
use_case: Compare alternate resource allocations across initiatives.
guardrails: Do not exceed 100 percent allocation per role.
Highlight headcount gaps instead of inventing capacity.
prompt: Take the initiatives in {{initiatives}} with effort estimates {{effort_table}} and match them to role capacity {{capacity}}. Produce three scenarios (focus, balanced, aggressive) with allocation percent, unstaffed hours, and decisions required.

title: Discovery Interview Planner
use_case: Prepare customer discovery sessions with goals, scripts, and scoring.
guardrails: Do not use leading or biased questions.
Include at least two open ended probes per theme.
prompt: With goal {{goal_statement}}, persona {{persona_summary}}, and hypotheses {{hypotheses}}, craft a 45 minute interview guide. Include intro script, thematic sections, neutral questions, and a scoring rubric for need, willingness, and fit.

title: Budget Scenario Forecaster
use_case: Build optimistic, base, and downside budget scenarios for the upcoming fiscal year.
guardrails: Never invent revenue drivers that are not provided.
Escalate if variance exceeds 15 percent from baseline guidance.
prompt: Using the baseline budget {{baseline_budget}} and scenario assumptions {{assumptions}}, generate optimistic, base, and downside views. Provide line by line totals, percent deltas, and call out the three largest moves with rationale.

title: Change Impact Matrix
use_case: Map stakeholder groups against expected change impacts and required actions.
guardrails: Mark unknown impacts as TBD rather than assuming details.
Capture at least one mitigation per high impact cell.
prompt: Given stakeholder segments {{segments}} and change summary {{change_overview}}, build an impact matrix with reach, severity, and mitigation owners. Highlight the top three hotspots with the proposed mitigation timeline.

title: Launch Readiness Checklist
use_case: Coordinate cross functional launch activities and readiness gates.
guardrails: Require sign off for tasks tagged high risk.
List unresolved dependencies separate from complete tasks.
prompt: Review the launch milestone plan {{milestones}} and risk register {{risks}}. Generate a readiness checklist grouped by workstream with status, owner, and go or no go criteria. Surface any risks that lack mitigation.

title: Portfolio Review Packet
use_case: Summarize initiative health for quarterly portfolio councils.
guardrails: Escalate any project more than 30 days past due.
Use provided KPIs; do not invent metrics.
prompt: Create a council ready packet summarizing initiatives in {{status_updates}}. Include a TLDR, a traffic light dashboard with KPIs, and spotlight sections for red programs detailing recovery plans.

title: Program Risk Status
use_case: Roll up program level risks with trend indicators.
guardrails: Document trend direction with evidence links.
Call out any risk without an assigned owner.
prompt: Using the risk register {{risk_register}} and mitigation plans {{mitigations}}, prepare a risk status report with trend (up, down, stable), confidence, and next review date. Highlight the top three emerging risks with immediate actions.

title: Competitive Landscape Scan
use_case: Synthesize competitor moves, positioning, and signals from recent news.
guardrails: Cite all claims with a source URL and access date.
Flag rumors or speculative items as unverified.
prompt: Analyze the competitor updates in {{clippings}} and pricing intel {{pricing}}. Produce a briefing with positioning shifts, product launches, and go to market signals. List sources with access date and confidence score.

title: Voice of Customer Digest
use_case: Consolidate survey, interview, and support signals into a monthly digest.
guardrails: Remove customer identifiers before summarizing.
Separate verbatim quotes from analyst commentary.
prompt: Combine the survey data {{survey_data}}, interviews {{transcripts}}, and ticket tags {{ticket_tags}} to produce a voice of customer digest. Include a TLDR, top themes with frequency, notable quotes (anonymized), and recommended follow ups.

title: Literature Review Abstractor
use_case: Summarize academic or industry papers into structured abstracts with key findings.
guardrails: Clearly label any paywalled sources.
List knowledge gaps that need expert follow up.
prompt: Given the paper details in {{papers}}, produce structured abstracts with sections: objective, method, findings, limitations, next questions. Include citation metadata and note missing data.

title: Regulatory Watch Brief
use_case: Aggregate regulatory updates impacting AI deployments.
guardrails: Escalate unresolved legal interpretations to counsel.
Include jurisdiction and effective dates for every item.
prompt: Using regulation alerts {{alerts}} and summaries {{summaries}}, build a brief that lists changes by jurisdiction, effective date, impacted teams, and required actions. Highlight items needing legal review.

title: Persona Insight Builder
use_case: Compile persona snapshots from qualitative and quantitative research.
guardrails: Maintain anonymized identifiers only.
Separate assumptions from validated insights.
prompt: Blend the qualitative insights {{interviews}} with analytics {{analytics}} to produce persona cards covering goals, pains, workflows, and tech stack. Add the top three quotes per persona and validation status.

title: Opportunity Sizing Model
use_case: Estimate market size and revenue potential for new opportunities.
guardrails: List all assumptions with data source.
Do not extrapolate beyond provided market bands.
prompt: Using market data {{market_data}} and pricing {{pricing_model}}, estimate TAM, SAM, and SOM with low, medium, and high adoption scenarios. Provide calculations, assumptions, and sensitivity commentary.

title: Trend Radar Newsletter
use_case: Summarize macro and micro trends impacting the business.
guardrails: Include at least one counter signal per trend.
Flag citation confidence levels.
prompt: Review trend data {{trend_feed}} and indicators {{indicators}}. Build a newsletter with sections: macro trends, industry shifts, emerging signals, counter signals, recommended actions.

title: Experiment Results Synthesizer
use_case: Summarize A/B or multivariate experiment outcomes with insights and next steps.
guardrails: Label statistical significance and sample sizes.
Flag any data quality issues for analyst follow up.
prompt: Using experiment data {{experiment_data}} and segments {{segments}}, create a summary with hypothesis, key metrics, significance, learnings, and recommended follow up tests. Include a decision log for roll out.

title: Claims Validation Worksheet
use_case: Validate marketing or product claims with supporting evidence.
guardrails: List evidence source and access date for every claim.
Escalate unverifiable claims to compliance before publication.
prompt: Cross check claim statements in {{claims}} with evidence {{evidence}}. For each claim record status (verified, needs review, rejected), evidence link, and reviewer notes. Summarize unresolved claims at the end.

title: Insights Workshop Agenda
use_case: Create agendas for insight sharing workshops with discussion prompts.
guardrails: Include time allocations that match the session length.
Add facilitation tips for sensitive findings.
prompt: Design a workshop agenda for {{goal}} with participants {{participants}} using findings {{findings}}. Include timings, discussion prompts, and capture template guidance.

title: Annual Narrative Draft Kit
use_case: Convert OKR and financial data into a leadership-ready annual narrative.
guardrails: Do not invent performance metrics; only use numbers supplied in the packet.
Label gaps as follow-up items instead of fabricating estimates.
prompt: You are preparing an annual planning narrative. Using the OKR data in {{okr_table}}, financial summary {{financials}}, and highlights {{notes}}, draft an 800-word narrative covering wins, misses, and adjustments. Close with a bulleted action list identifying the accountable leader and due date for each follow-up.

title: Adaptive Budget Rebalancer
use_case: Reallocate budgets across initiatives using scenario inputs.
guardrails: Keep spend within each cost-center ceiling provided.
Flag scenarios that rely on unapproved headcount or tooling.
prompt: Evaluate the initiatives in {{baseline_budget}} against scenario drivers {{drivers}} and priority ranking {{priorities}}. Produce three rebalanced budgets (focus, balanced, growth) that honor every ceiling. Highlight trade-offs, headcount impacts, and decisions required to adopt each scenario.

title: Program Retrospective Synthesizer
use_case: Roll up multi-workstream retrospective notes into a concise report.
guardrails: Cluster insights by theme before listing examples.
Separate structural issues from one-off events.
prompt: Synthesize the retrospective notes in {{retro_notes}} with metrics {{metrics}} and leadership goals {{goals}}. Produce sections for What Worked, What Slowed Us Down, and Decisions. Add a table showing recommended playbook updates with owners and target dates.

title: Headcount Capacity Forecaster
use_case: Forecast hiring pace and capacity impact across teams.
guardrails: Use provided attrition assumptions; do not invent averages.
Highlight roles that exceed 90 percent utilization.
prompt: Combine the roster {{roster}}, open roles {{open_roles}}, attrition forecast {{attrition}}, and demand forecast {{demand}}. Project capacity by role for the next three quarters, highlighting utilization hot spots, hiring gaps, and the earliest date each critical role gets relief.

title: Intake Routing Orchestrator
use_case: Triage inbound project requests into the correct governance path.
guardrails: Route to clarification if required fields are missing.
Do not approve requests lacking an executive sponsor.
prompt: Review the request in {{submission}} using governance rules {{rules}} and current capacity {{capacity}}. Decide whether to approve, defer, or reject. Provide rationale, required follow-ups, and the next review gate with dates.

title: Competitor Deep Dive Tear-Down
use_case: Compare competitor launch messaging, pricing, and differentiation.
guardrails: Cite each claim with the source URL or document ID.
Separate analyst commentary from verifiable facts.
prompt: Analyze the competitor assets in {{assets}} plus pricing {{pricing}} and analyst commentary {{commentary}}. Produce a table comparing positioning, feature coverage, and pricing. Close with a memo listing three opportunities, three threats, and recommended responses.

title: Voice of Customer Theme Miner
use_case: Surface customer themes from qualitative feedback and route next actions.
guardrails: Flag any feedback mentioning personal data for manual review.
Cluster themes only when at least two distinct customers raise them.
prompt: Review the transcripts {{transcripts}}, survey responses {{surveys}}, and usage metrics {{usage}}. Group customer feedback into themes with sentiment, representative quotes, and recommended next actions with owners.

title: Academic Literature Spotter
use_case: Summarize recent academic research supporting a hypothesis.
guardrails: Return citations in APA format with DOI when available.
Note limitations or sample sizes that reduce confidence.
prompt: Given the research question {{question}}, corpus {{corpus}}, and inclusion criteria {{criteria}}, identify the five most relevant papers. Provide an annotated bibliography with key findings, methods, and limitations, then summarize how the evidence supports or challenges the hypothesis.

title: Signal-to-Noise Incident Monitor
use_case: Detect emerging risk signals from support tickets, social media, and logs.
guardrails: Do not include unsupported speculation; cite artifact IDs for each signal.
Escalate any safety or legal keywords immediately.
prompt: Analyze the support tickets {{tickets}}, social listening digest {{social}}, and system alerts {{alerts}}. Surface repeating signals, quantify volume trends, and flag incidents requiring escalation with recommended next steps and owners.

title: Field Research Trip Planner
use_case: Plan an in-person research sprint with recruiting, schedule, and deliverables.
guardrails: Respect recruiting constraints (privacy, incentives).
Include contingency plans for no-shows or equipment failure.
prompt: Using the goals {{goals}}, participant profiles {{profiles}}, and logistics {{logistics}}, draft a field research plan with session objectives, schedule, recruiting requirements, and equipment checklist. Add contingency actions for high-risk assumptions.

title: Executive Q&A Pack Builder
use_case: Generate anticipated questions and answers for an executive appearance.
guardrails: Flag any question touching on forward-looking financials for legal review.
Mark answers that require additional fact-checking before use.
prompt: Using the event brief {{brief}}, messaging pillars {{pillars}}, and press coverage {{press}}, create a Q&A pack with likely questions, succinct answers, and confidence tags (Ready, Needs Fact Check, Requires Legal). Include escalation owners and due dates for any outstanding validation.

title: Change Town Hall Deck Outline
use_case: Draft a talk track and slide outline for change management town halls.
guardrails: Call out confirmed decisions versus proposals.
Insert placeholder slides for legal/compliance requirements.
prompt: Draft a 12-slide outline for the change described in {{summary}} targeting the personas {{personas}} with the timeline {{timeline}}. Each slide should include purpose, key points, and speaker notes. Highlight slide(s) requiring compliance or legal review.

title: Product Launch Narrative Generator
use_case: Create a launch brief with narrative, proof, and customer hooks.
guardrails: Include proof points with source references.
Highlight experimentation guardrails for claims.
prompt: Using the product fact sheet {{facts}}, customer proof {{proof}}, and goals {{goals}}, craft a launch narrative with sections for Problem, Solution, Proof, and Call to Action. Add a messaging table mapping persona, key message, evidence, and CTA.

title: Incident Communication Ladder
use_case: Draft multi-channel messaging for customer-impacting incidents.
guardrails: Follow the incident severity matrix for cadence and channels.
Never speculate on root cause before engineering confirmation.
prompt: Based on the incident summary {{summary}}, severity {{severity}}, and customer segments {{segments}}, draft comms for status page, customer email, and internal briefing. Include timestamps, accountable owner, and next update promise. Call out any compliance or legal approvals required.

title: Localization Brief Composer
use_case: Generate translation briefs with context, tone, and QA steps.
guardrails: Specify tone preferences and forbidden phrases per locale.
Outline QA owners before release.
prompt: Create a localization brief using the source {{source}}, locale requirements {{locales}}, and style guide {{style}}. Include tone guidance, glossary terms, file delivery expectations, and QA checklist with owners.

title: Legacy Bug Reproduction Kit
use_case: Generate precise steps and logging guidance to reproduce a legacy bug.
guardrails: Never run destructive commands unless explicitly provided.
Collect logs in redacted form; no production secrets.
prompt: Using the ticket {{ticket}}, environment notes {{environment}}, and workarounds {{workarounds}}, produce detailed reproduction steps with expected versus actual outcomes, required log capture, and escalation instructions if reproduction fails.

title: API Contract Drafter
use_case: Draft REST API contract updates with schema diffs and migration notes.
guardrails: Highlight breaking changes separately with rollout strategy.
Document versioning implications and deprecation windows.
prompt: Review the existing contract {{contract}}, change notes {{changes}}, and consumers {{consumers}}. Produce a proposed contract in OpenAPI-style pseudo syntax, highlight breaking changes, and add a migration checklist with owners and deadlines.

title: Data Pipeline Health Reporter
use_case: Summarize pipeline runs with anomalies, data quality, and impact.
guardrails: Quantify anomaly impact using provided metrics.
Escalate any data quality issue hitting critical thresholds.
prompt: Analyze the pipeline logs {{logs}}, data quality checks {{dq_checks}}, and dependencies {{dependencies}}. Summarize success/failure counts, anomalies, impacted datasets, and recommend remediation steps with owners.

title: Test Coverage Gap Finder
use_case: Identify under-tested modules using coverage reports and defect logs.
guardrails: Recommend tests only for modules below the target threshold.
Link each recommendation to a defect trend or risk justification.
prompt: Review the coverage report {{coverage}}, defect log {{defects}}, and thresholds {{thresholds}}. Identify modules below target, tie them to defect trends, and recommend specific test types with owners and estimated effort.

title: Infrastructure Runbook Generator
use_case: Draft incident runbooks for new infrastructure components.
guardrails: Follow the standard runbook template with escalation tiers.
Include rollback instructions and validation checks before closing.
prompt: Using the component description {{component}}, failure modes {{failures}}, and monitoring signals {{signals}}, draft a runbook with detection, containment, remediation, rollback, and validation steps. Add escalation matrix and communication checklist.

title: Accessibility Audit Storyboard
use_case: Convert accessibility findings into a shareable storyboard for stakeholders.
guardrails: Map each issue to WCAG criteria and severity.
Suggest remediation owners without assigning engineering estimates.
prompt: Using audit findings {{findings}}, screenshots {{screenshots}}, and owner list {{owners}}, draft a storyboard with scene descriptions, impact narrative, WCAG references, and recommended remediation owners.

title: Prompt Fuzzing Attack Harness
use_case: Stress test AI prompts for jailbreak and policy violations.
guardrails: Log any policy-violating output with full context for legal review.
Do not deploy the harness to production tenants.
prompt: Given the target prompt {{prompt_under_test}}, attack corpus {{attacks}}, and policy checklist {{policy}}, run a fuzzing analysis describing which attacks breached guardrails, the resulting output, and mitigation recommendations ranked by severity.

title: Regression Test Selector
use_case: Select minimal regression suite based on change diff and risk profile.
guardrails: Ensure critical paths are always included regardless of diff size.
Flag any missing environments required to run the selection.
prompt: Review the change summary {{change}}, risk matrix {{risk}}, and test catalog {{catalog}}. Recommend the smallest test set that maintains coverage, noting rationale and required environment setups.

title: User Acceptance Exit Report
use_case: Summarize UAT results with go-live recommendations and blockers.
guardrails: List blockers separately from cosmetic issues.
Capture tester sign-off status with timestamps.
prompt: Using the UAT results {{results}}, defects {{defects}}, and exit criteria {{criteria}}, summarize readiness, list open blockers with owners, and provide go/no-go recommendation with rationale.

title: Risk Register Summarizer
use_case: Summarize quality risks by probability, impact, and mitigation status.
guardrails: Retain original risk IDs for traceability.
Do not downgrade risk ratings without recorded approval.
prompt: Review the risk register {{register}}, mitigation updates {{updates}}, and owner roster {{owners}}. Summarize top risks by probability and impact, note mitigation progress, and call out items past due with owners.

title: Regression Test Planner
use_case: Plan regression suites for releases with risk-based prioritization.
guardrails: Identify critical paths and impacted integrations.
Map each test suite to execution owner and timeline.
prompt: Create a regression plan for release {{release}} using scope {{scope}}, defect history {{defects}}, and environment matrix {{matrix}}. Prioritize suites, assign owners, and list entry/exit criteria.

title: Bug Reproduction Script
use_case: Document reproducible steps for reported defects with environment details.
guardrails: Record exact data inputs and environment configuration.
Capture expected vs actual results clearly.
prompt: Based on bug report {{report}}, evidence {{evidence}}, and environment {{environment}}, document numbered reproduction steps, expected vs actual outcome, and attach evidence references.

title: Test Summary Reporter
use_case: Summarize test execution results with metrics and release readiness.
guardrails: Provide pass/fail counts by suite and severity.
Highlight unresolved critical defects with owner and ETA.
prompt: Summarize test logs {{logs}}, defect tracker {{defects}}, and release criteria {{criteria}}. Provide suite metrics, readiness assessment, and next steps.

title: Accessibility Audit Checklist
use_case: Evaluate UI changes against WCAG compliance checkpoints.
guardrails: Reference WCAG version and success criteria for each finding.
Offer remediation guidance with examples or component references.
prompt: Audit UI {{ui}}, components {{components}}, and checklist {{checklist}} for WCAG compliance. List pass/fail per criterion, severity, and remediation actions.

title: Load Test Findings Digest
use_case: Interpret performance test outputs and recommend mitigations.
guardrails: Compare observed metrics to SLO thresholds.
Document environment setup to reproduce results.
prompt: Summarize load test report {{report}} against SLOs {{slos}} with environment {{environment}}. Highlight bottlenecks, recommend mitigations, and specify retest criteria.

title: Release QA Checklist
use_case: Ensure release readiness across QA sign-offs and environment checks.
guardrails: Confirm sign-off from QA, product, and operations.
Document rollback and contingency steps.
prompt: Compile a release QA checklist using notes {{notes}}, sign-off matrix {{signoffs}}, and rollback plan {{rollback}}. Include verification steps, owner sign-offs, and contingencies.

title: Defect Triage Moderator
use_case: Facilitate defect triage sessions with prioritization outcomes.
guardrails: Escalate any blocker defects to release manager immediately.
Assign follow-up actions with explicit owners and due dates.
prompt: Moderate defect triage using list {{defects}}, severity matrix {{matrix}}, and timeline {{timeline}}. Categorize defects, set priorities, and assign resolution owners with deadlines.

title: Traceability Matrix Builder
use_case: Link requirements to test cases and defects for audit readiness.
guardrails: Ensure every requirement maps to at least one test case.
Highlight orphaned tests or requirements for remediation.
prompt: Generate a traceability matrix using requirements {{requirements}}, tests {{tests}}, and defects {{defects}}. Show coverage links, identify gaps, and recommend remediation.

title: UAT Feedback Synthesizer
use_case: Summarize user acceptance testing feedback with prioritized fixes.
guardrails: Separate critical blockers from usability suggestions.
Capture user quotes anonymously with role context.
prompt: Synthesize UAT notes {{notes}}, issue tracker {{issues}}, and roster {{roster}} into blockers, major findings, minor suggestions, and recommended fixes with owners.

title: QA Risk Register
use_case: Maintain QA-specific risk log with mitigation tracking.
guardrails: Assign each risk a probability, impact, and owner.
Escalate risks breaching threshold to program steering committee.
prompt: Create a QA risk register using brainstorm {{brainstorm}}, incidents {{incidents}}, and mitigation backlog {{mitigations}}. Provide probability, impact, owner, and mitigation status for each risk.
